title: Birbhum violence: Five BJP MLAs, including Suvendu, suspended after ruling, opposition members clash in Bengal Assembly - The Indian Express
content:
1. Birbhum violence: Five BJP MLAs, including Suvendu, suspended after ruling, opposition members clash in Bengal Assembly  The Indian Express
  2. Watch: Trinamool, BJP Come To Blows In Bengal Assembly  NDTV
  3. Bengal: 5 BJP MLAs, Including Suvendu, Suspended After Clash In Assembly Over Birbhum Violence  ABP Live
  4. 5 BJP MLAs suspended from Bengal assembly amid huge chaos over Birbhum violence  Hindustan Times
  5. Birbhum Killings | BJP, TMC MLAs Clash in West Bengal Assembly Over Rampurhat Incident | The Quint  The Quint
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: Other than Adhikari and Tigga, three MLAs--Shankar Ghosh, Narahari Mahato, and Dipak Burman--were also suspended after the chaotic scenes in the Assembly. Adhikari alleged, "We were illegally suspended."
